title: 100 % Orange Juice
description:
100% Orange Juice is a digital multiplayer board game populated by developer Orange Juiceâ€™s all-star cast. Characters from Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting , Suguri and Sora come together with all-new characters to duke it out with dice. Quilts and Cats of Calico
This is a world where dogs , people and machines fly through the air. In that world, a small patch of darkness was born. Infinitesimal at first, it gradually began to envelop everything A youth named Kai, led by the mysterious life form known as Marie Poppo , begins a journey that will span worlds. The black, bottomless darkness of desire slowly eats away at both Kai and the world itself. Let Marie Poppo lead you into a mysterious world to play. Grab your deck of cards and let the games begin

system_requirements.Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
